description:
Luna, a friend of Maya, comes to visit. She quickly falls in love with Kaji so she gives him gifts, but he finds them repulsive (a dead lizard, for example). Maya decides to help Luna and now Nina must stop her from using magic on Kaji.
She is like a goddess of unluck. (When she wishes for something to end up well it ends up bad, when she wishes something to end up bad it ends up even worse.)
name: Luna
